entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2010/06. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population
entry.dcterms:creator: Hegedűs, Péter
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-H25: TÁRKI Omnibus 2010/06. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population. data sheet. Version: 2013-01-09

entry.dcterms:description: The blocks of the TÁRKI 2010/06. omnibus survey: 1; Political attitude. 2; Assessment of one's own and the country's economic situation 3; Time preferences research 4; Opinion about the using of the bus traffic lane
entry.dcterms:subject: mass political behavior, attitudes
political ideology
person
survey data
cross-section

Multi-stage proportionately stratified national probability sample representative of the adult Hungarian population. Respondents were selected using the random walking method out of each strata. Numbers of selected persons are proportional to strata's size
face-to-face interview
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
